course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Mathematics and Daily Life
course.description: This is a project-based independent study course, that students will explore some equations that have important applications in daily life. Such equations are related to finance, betting and decision making. For each equation, students learn the background by themselves, and then study the equations, and use computer programming to explore in projects how such equations may be used in daily life. Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
